plot: Achilles' shock attack on Troy's ally Cilicia deals a major blow to the Trojans and casts the spotlight on Helen. Andromache receives good and bad news. A bitter dispute erupts in the Greek camp.

The Trojans tunnel through to Cilicia to obtain rations but the Cilicians are attacked by the Spartans led by Achilles, who burn the food, capturing those that they do not kill. As a result Priam closes the tunnel but the Spartans are concerned when their prisoners start to die of the plague. They believe it is because they have captured a priest's daughter, Chriseis, leading to a split between Agamemnon and Patroclus. Meanwhile Menelaus arranges a duel with Paris to decide the fate of the city.—don @ minifie-1
